sentence: CAMBRIDGE, Wis. (AP) Among the red barns, bins and tractors of a southern Wisconsin dairy farm, Democratic U.S. Senate candidate Mandela Barnes sat at a white picnic table painted with black spots to resemble a dairy cow.
author: Scott Bauer
title: Wisconsin Democrats search for strategy to unseat GOP Sen. Ron Johnson
